p: While progress in the GVAP research and development agenda has been strong, many other important GVAP targets have not been met. In particular, global coverage with basic vaccines has improved very little since 2010, leaving an estimated 19.9 million children unreached or incompletely vaccinated in 2017 [4], [5], [6]. In response to these gaps, this GVIRF featured two overarching themes, “Innovating for Equity” and “End-to-End Integration.” This report summarizes the forum discussions; presentations and other materials from the 2018 GVIRF can be found at http://www.who.int/immunization/research/forums_and_initiatives/gvirf/forum_2018/en/.
